title: Managing Personnel Readiness Under Stop-Loss
description: A unit is under 'Stop-Loss' (personnel cannot leave the military) for a deployment. A personnel officer must track the status of soldiers whose contracts would have otherwise expired.

tasks.description: Query the personnel database to identify all soldiers in the unit affected by the stop-loss policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer generates an accurate list of all affected soldiers.

tasks.description: Monitor the morale and well-being of these specific soldiers, flagging any who may require additional support.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer uses available tools to track morale indicators for the affected cohort.

tasks.description: Ensure that the administrative and pay processes are correctly handled for these soldiers to reflect their extended service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer verifies that all administrative actions are completed correctly for the stop-lossed soldiers.
